name: Divinity: Original Sin 2 - Definitive Edition
notes: Virtual desktop required. To change the resolution right-click D:OS2 > Configure > Runner options > Virtual desktop resolution
content:
game:
  appid: 435150
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: dotnet472
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
winesteam:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: 1920x1080
  dxvk: true
  overrides:
    xaudio2_7: native,builtin
